channel.title: Help me
channel.description:
Hello,
Im using Dannyscapv4 ( Delta Based)
How can i remove/change how much money they get for 1 click at a thieving stall becaus 100k is too much for 1 click.

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @ouassim ouassim
item.description:
@ouassim wrote:

Oke tnx works.

How can i remove this command permanent ?

sendQuest("::onpickup, ::offpickup (mod+)", 8149);

}
if(command.startsWith(“onpickup”) && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith(“pickupon”) && playerRights > 0){
talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items enabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = true;
}
if(command.startsWith(“offpickup”) && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith(“pickupoff”) && playerRights > 0){
talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = false;
}

Read full topic
